snippet: Millions of Americans have to work when ill or take unpaid sick days, which can lead to financial hardship or dismissal. A national law requiring businesses to provide paid sick leave is needed.
abstract: Editorial calls for a national law requiring businesses to provide paid sick leave; applauds the New York City Council members who are pushing for such a law in light of federal inaction.
lead_paragraph: Millions of Americans have to work when ill or take unpaid sick days, which can lead to financial hardship or dismissal. A national law requiring businesses to provide paid sick leave is needed.
